mapper.select: SELECT ts.*, CASE WHEN tu.is_deleted = 1 THEN 'No' ELSE COALESCE(tu.first_name, 'No') END AS first_name, CASE WHEN tu.is_deleted = 1 THEN 'User' ELSE COALESCE(tu.last_name, 'User') END AS last_name, ta.area_name, CASE WHEN tu.is_deleted = 1 THEN 0 ELSE COALESCE(tu.project_id, 0) END AS project_id, CASE WHEN tu.is_deleted = 1 THEN 'No Project' ELSE COALESCE(tp.project_name, 'No Project') END AS project_name, CASE WHEN tu.is_deleted = 1 THEN '#FFFFFF' ELSE COALESCE(tc.color_code, '#FFFFFF') END AS color_code, COALESCE(tss.seat_status, 'No Seat Status') AS seat_status FROM table_seat ts LEFT JOIN table_user tu ON ts.user_id = tu.user_id LEFT JOIN table_area ta ON ts.area_id = ta.area_id LEFT JOIN table_project tp ON tu.project_id = tp.project_id LEFT JOIN table_color tc ON tp.color_id = tc.color_id LEFT JOIN table_seatstatus tss ON ts.seatstatus_id = tss.seatstatus_id
